1.0.name: wordpress/jquery-tinytips
1.0.description:
Adds tinytips tooltips to links on your site. Comes with 8 different themes. The tinytip can be added to a link using the WordPress visual editor.

The plugin can be automated to add the functionality for all links.

Tinytips tooltips are added for all links that have a "title" attribute.

See the plugin page for demo pages.

For more information visit the FAQ. If you have questions or problems, feel free to write an email to blog [at] techotronic.de or write an entry at the jQuery Tinytips WordPress.org forum

Localization

  • English (en_EN) by Arne Franken
  • German (de_DE) by Arne Franken

Includes
